00036         void CsgApplication::Initialize(void) {
00037             // register all io plugins
00038             TrajectoryWriter::RegisterPlugins();
00039             TrajectoryReader::RegisterPlugins();
00040             TopologyReader::RegisterPlugins();
00041 
00042             AddProgramOptions()
00043                     ("top", boost::program_options::value<string > (), "  atomistic topology file");
00044             if (DoMapping()) {
00045                 if (DoMappingDefault()) {
00046                     AddProgramOptions("Mapping options")
00047                             ("cg", boost::program_options::value<string > (), "  coarse graining mapping definitions (xml-file)")
00048                             ("map-ignore", boost::program_options::value<string >(), "  list of molecules to ignore separated by ;")
00049                             ("no-map", "  disable mapping and act on original trajectory");
00050                 } else {
00051                     AddProgramOptions("Mapping options")
00052                             ("cg", boost::program_options::value<string > (), "  [OPTIONAL] coarse graining mapping definitions\n"
00053                             "  (xml-file). If no file is given, program acts on original trajectory")
00054                             ("map-ignore", boost::program_options::value<string >(), "  list of molecules to ignore if mapping is done separated by ;");
00055                 }
00056             }
00057 
00058 
00059             if (DoTrajectory())
00060                 AddProgramOptions("Trajectory options")
00061                 ("trj", boost::program_options::value<string > (), "  atomistic trajectory file")
00062                 ("begin", boost::program_options::value<double>()->default_value(0.0), "  skip frames before this time")
00063                 ("first-frame", boost::program_options::value<int>()->default_value(0), "  start with this frame")
00064                 ("nframes", boost::program_options::value<int>(), "  process the given number of frames")
00065                 ;
00066 
00067             if (DoThreaded())
00068                 /*
00069                  * TODO default value of 1 for nt is not smart
00070                  */
00071                 AddProgramOptions("Threading options")
00072                 ("nt", boost::program_options::value<int>()->default_value(1), "  number of threads")
00073                 ;
00074 
00075         }
00076 
00077         bool CsgApplication::EvaluateOptions(void) {
00078             _do_mapping = false;
00079             CheckRequired("top", "no topology file specified");
00080 
00081             // check for mapping options
00082             if (DoMapping()) {
00083                 // default mapping is on
00084                 if (DoMappingDefault()) {
00085                     // if the user does not explicitly ask to turn it off, cg is needed
00086                     if (OptionsMap().count("no-map") == 0) {
00087                         CheckRequired("cg", "no coarse graining definition specified");
00088                         _do_mapping = true;
00089                     }
00090                 }// default mapping is off, if user gives cg, then do mapping
00091                 else if (OptionsMap().count("cg")) {
00092                     _do_mapping = true;
00093                 }
00094             }
00095 
00096             /* check threading options */
00097             if (DoThreaded()) {
00098                 _nthreads = _op_vm["nt"].as<int > ();
00099                 /* TODO
00100                  * does the number of threads make sense?
00101                  * which criteria should be used? smaller than system's cores?
00102                  */
00103             }
00104 
00105             return true;
00106         }
00107 
00108         void CsgApplication::ShowHelpText(std::ostream &out) {
00109             string name = ProgramName();
00110             if (VersionString() != "")
00111                 name = name + ", version " + VersionString();
00112 
00113             HelpTextHeader(name);
00114             HelpText(out);
00115             out << "\n\n" << OptionsDesc() << endl;
00116         }
00117 
00118         void CsgApplication::Worker::Run(void) {
00119             while (_app->ProcessData(this)) {
00120                 if (_app->SynchronizeThreads()) {
00121                     int id = getId();
00122                     _app->_threadsMutexesOut[id]->Lock();
00123                     _app->MergeWorker(this);
00124                     _app->_threadsMutexesOut[(id + 1) % _app->_nthreads]->Unlock();
00125                 }
00126             }
00127         }
00128 
00129         bool CsgApplication::ProcessData(Worker * worker) {
00130 
00131             int id;
00132             id = worker->getId();
00133 
00134             if (SynchronizeThreads()) {
00135                 //wait til its your turn
00136                 _threadsMutexesIn[id]->Lock();
00137             }
00138             _traj_readerMutex.Lock();
00139             if (_nframes == 0) {
00140                 _traj_readerMutex.Unlock();
00141 
00142                 if (SynchronizeThreads()) {
00143                     //done processing? don't forget to unlock next worker anyway
00144                     _threadsMutexesIn[(id + 1) % _nthreads]->Unlock();
00145                 }
00146 
00147                 return false;
00148             }
00149             _nframes--;
00150             if (!_is_first_frame || worker->getId() != 0) {
00151                 //get frame
00152                 bool tmpRes = _traj_reader->NextFrame(worker->_top);
00153                 if (!tmpRes) {
00154                     _traj_readerMutex.Unlock();
00155                     if (SynchronizeThreads())
00156                         _threadsMutexesIn[(id + 1) % _nthreads]->Unlock();
00157                     return false;
00158                 }
00159             }
00160             if (worker->getId() == 0)
00161                 _is_first_frame = false;
00162 
00163             _traj_readerMutex.Unlock();
00164             if (SynchronizeThreads()) {
00165                 //unlock next frame for input
00166                 _threadsMutexesIn[(id + 1) % _nthreads]->Unlock();
00167             }
00168             //evaluate
00169             if (_do_mapping) {
00170                 worker->_map->Apply();
00171                 worker->EvalConfiguration(&worker->_top_cg, &worker->_top);
00172             } else
00173                 worker->EvalConfiguration(&worker->_top);
00174 
00175             return true;
00176         }
00177 
00178         void CsgApplication::Run(void) {
00179             TopologyReader *reader;
00180             // create reader for atomistic topology
00181             reader = TopReaderFactory().Create(_op_vm["top"].as<string > ());
00182             if (reader == NULL)
00183                 throw runtime_error(string("input format not supported: ") + _op_vm["top"].as<string > ());
00184 
00185             class DummyWorker : public Worker {
00186             public:
00187 
00188                 void EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref) {
00189                     _app->EvalConfiguration(top, top_ref);
00190                 }
00191             };
00192 
00193             // create the master worker
00194             Worker *master = NULL;
00195             if (DoThreaded())
00196                 master = ForkWorker();
00197             else
00198                 master = new DummyWorker();
00199 
00200             master->setApplication(this);
00201             master->setId(0);
00202             _myWorkers.push_back(master);
00203 
00204             CGEngine cg;
00205 
00207             // read in the topology for master
00209             reader->ReadTopology(_op_vm["top"].as<string > (), master->_top);
00210             cout << "I have " << master->_top.BeadCount() << " beads in " << master->_top.MoleculeCount() << " molecules" << endl;
00211             master->_top.CheckMoleculeNaming();
00212 
00213             if (_do_mapping) {
00214                 // read in the coarse graining definitions (xml files)
00215                 cg.LoadMoleculeType(_op_vm["cg"].as<string > ());
00216                 // create the mapping + cg topology
00217 
00218                 if(_op_vm.count("map-ignore") != 0) {
00219                     Tokenizer tok(_op_vm["map-ignore"].as<string>(), ";");
00220                     Tokenizer::iterator iter;
00221                     for(iter=tok.begin(); iter!=tok.end(); ++iter) {
00222                         string str=*iter;
00223                         boost::trim(str);
00224                         if(str.length() > 0)
00225                             cg.AddIgnore(str);
00226                     }
00227                 }
00228 
00229                 master->_map = cg.CreateCGTopology(master->_top, master->_top_cg);
00230 
00231                 cout << "I have " << master->_top_cg.BeadCount() << " beads in " << master->_top_cg.MoleculeCount() << " molecules for the coarsegraining" << endl;
00232                 master->_map->Apply();
00233                 if (!EvaluateTopology(&master->_top_cg, &master->_top))
00234                     return;
00235             } else
00236                 if (!EvaluateTopology(&master->_top))
00237                 return;
00238 
00240             // Here trajectory parsing starts
00242             if (DoTrajectory() && _op_vm.count("trj")) {
00243                 double begin;
00244                 int first_frame;
00245                 bool has_begin = false;
00246 
00247                 if (_op_vm.count("begin")) {
00248                     has_begin = true;
00249                     begin = _op_vm["begin"].as<double>();
00250                 }
00251 
00252                 _nframes = -1;
00253                 if (_op_vm.count("nframes")) {
00254                     _nframes = _op_vm["nframes"].as<int>();
00255                 }
00256 
00257                 first_frame = _op_vm["first-frame"].as<int>();
00258 
00259                 // create reader for trajectory
00260                 _traj_reader = TrjReaderFactory().Create(_op_vm["trj"].as<string > ());
00261                 if (_traj_reader == NULL)
00262                     throw runtime_error(string("input format not supported: ") + _op_vm["trj"].as<string > ());
00263                 // open the trajectory
00264                 _traj_reader->Open(_op_vm["trj"].as<string > ());
00265 
00267                 // Create all the workers
00269                 for (int thread = 1; thread < _nthreads && DoThreaded(); thread++) {
00270                     Worker *myWorker = ForkWorker();
00271                     myWorker->setApplication(this);
00272                     myWorker->setId(thread);
00273                     _myWorkers.push_back(myWorker);
00274 
00275                     // this will be changed to CopyTopologyData
00276                     // read in the topology
00277                     reader->ReadTopology(_op_vm["top"].as<string > (), myWorker->_top);
00278                     myWorker->_top.CheckMoleculeNaming();
00279 
00280                     if (_do_mapping) {
00281                         // create the mapping + cg topology
00282                         myWorker->_map = cg.CreateCGTopology(myWorker->_top, myWorker->_top_cg);
00283                     }
00284                 }
00285 
00287                 // Proceed to first frame of interest
00289 
00290                 _traj_reader->FirstFrame(master->_top);
00291                 if(master->_top.getBoxType()==BoundaryCondition::typeOpen) {
00292                     cout << "NOTE: You are using OpenBox boundary conditions. Check if this is intended.\n" << endl;
00293                 }
00294                 //seek first frame, let thread0 do that
00295                 bool bok;
00296                 for (bok = true; bok == true; bok = _traj_reader->NextFrame(master->_top)) {
00297                     if (((master->_top.getTime() < begin) && has_begin) || first_frame > 1) {
00298                         first_frame--;
00299                         continue;
00300                     }
00301                     break;
00302                 }
00303                 if (!bok) { // trajectory was too short and we did not proceed to first frame
00304                     _traj_reader->Close();
00305                     delete _traj_reader;
00306 
00307                     throw std::runtime_error("trajectory was too short, did not process a single frame");
00308                 }
00309 
00310                 // notify all observers that coarse graining has begun
00311                 if (_do_mapping) {
00312                     master->_map->Apply();
00313                     BeginEvaluate(&master->_top_cg, &master->_top);
00314                 } else
00315                     BeginEvaluate(&master->_top);
00316 
00317                 _is_first_frame = true;
00319                 //start threads
00320                 if (DoThreaded()) {
00321                     for (size_t thread = 0; thread < _myWorkers.size(); thread++) {
00322 
00323                         if (SynchronizeThreads()) {
00324                             Mutex *myMutexIn = new Mutex;
00325                             _threadsMutexesIn.push_back(myMutexIn);
00326                             // lock each worker for input
00327                             myMutexIn->Lock();
00328 
00329                             Mutex *myMutexOut = new Mutex;
00330                             _threadsMutexesOut.push_back(myMutexOut);
00331                             // lock each worker for output
00332                             myMutexOut->Lock();
00333                         }
00334                     }
00335                     for (size_t thread = 0; thread < _myWorkers.size(); thread++)
00336                         _myWorkers[thread]->Start();
00337 
00338                     if (SynchronizeThreads()) {
00339                         //unlock first thread and start ordered input/output
00340                         _threadsMutexesIn[0]->Unlock();
00341                         _threadsMutexesOut[0]->Unlock();
00342                     }
00343                     // mutex needed for merging if SynchronizeThreads()==False
00344                     Mutex mergeMutex;
00345                     for (size_t thread = 0; thread < _myWorkers.size(); thread++) {
00346                         _myWorkers[thread]->WaitDone();
00347                         if (!SynchronizeThreads()) {
00348                             mergeMutex.Lock();
00349                             MergeWorker(_myWorkers[thread]);
00350                             mergeMutex.Unlock();
00351                         }
00352                         delete _myWorkers[thread];
00353                     }
00354                     for (size_t thread = 0; thread < _threadsMutexesIn.size(); ++thread) {
00355                         delete _threadsMutexesIn[thread];
00356                         delete _threadsMutexesOut[thread];
00357                     }
00358 
00359 
00360                 } else {
00361                     master->Run();
00362                     delete master;
00363                 }
00364 
00365                 EndEvaluate();
00366 
00367                 _myWorkers.clear();
00368                 _threadsMutexesIn.clear();
00369                 _threadsMutexesOut.clear();
00370                 _traj_reader->Close();
00371 
00372                 delete _traj_reader;
00373             }
00374 
00375             delete reader;
00376 
00377         }
00378 
00379         CsgApplication::Worker::~Worker() {
00380             if (_map)
00381                 delete _map;
00382 
00383         }
00384 
00385         void CsgApplication::BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology * top_ref) {
00386             list<CGObserver *>::iterator iter;
00387             for (iter = _observers.begin(); iter != _observers.end(); ++iter)
00388                 (*iter)->BeginCG(top, top_ref);
00389         }
00390 
00391         void CsgApplication::EndEvaluate() {
00392             list<CGObserver *>::iterator iter;
00393             for (iter = _observers.begin(); iter != _observers.end(); ++iter)
00394                 (*iter)->EndCG();
00395         }
00396 
00397         void CsgApplication::EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology * top_ref) {
00398             list<CGObserver *>::iterator iter;
00399             for (iter = _observers.begin(); iter != _observers.end(); ++iter)
00400                 (*iter)->EvalConfiguration(top, top_ref);
00401         }

00403         CsgApplication::Worker *CsgApplication::ForkWorker(void) {
00404             throw std::runtime_error("ForkWorker not implemented in application");
00405             return NULL;
00406         }
00407 
00408         void CsgApplication::MergeWorker(CsgApplication::Worker *worker) {
00409             throw std::runtime_error("MergeWorker not implemented in application");
00410         }
